Function Documentation

real fbmod ( real  x,
real  m 
) [inline]

modulo float/real value

Takes a real number x and subtracts m as many times as possible without getting negative. Analog to % (mod) for int values.

Parameters:
x value that should be adjusted
m modulus
Returns:
x mod m
